name: WorkForceTrack
overview:
WorkforceTrack Projects web tool is online collaboration, reporting, task, time trackinga and billing solution with Google Apps integration aimed at making the management of your projects simple

â€¢ Attach Google Docs to tasks, projects, lead/client â€¢ View your projects, tasks on your Google calendar â€¢ Easily import your client contacts into CRM tool

FEATURES

  • Access WorkforceTrack from your Google universal navigation.
  • Track projects, timesheets, project costs, expenses, leads, invoices.
  • Integrations with WFT invoicing, payroll, management, CRM solutions.
  • WFT Project, tasks calendars synchronized with shared Google apps Calendars.
  • Ability to import projects from MS projects.
  • Projects Gantt chart reports.
  • Employee timesheets approval and attendance tracking feature.
  • Integrations with Linkedin, Twitter and Facebook.
  • Send out project based invoices using PayPal and Google Checkout integrations.
  • Case management/Ticketing system.
  • Create and share company news and anouncements.
  • Employee holiday and leave management.
  • Android, Iphone, Blackberry free apps.
  • Sync your MS outlook tasks, contacts and calendar with WFT Calendar.
  • Fill and sync your timesheets using MS Excel integration.
